author: RTÉ News
title: Global virus cases near one million
description: A six-week-old baby with Covid-19 has died and global agencies have warned of food shortages as coronavirus infections around the world near one million.
content:
A six-week-old baby with Covid-19 has died and global agencies have warned of food shortages as coronavirus infections around the world near one million.
Governments expanded lockdowns to affect about half of the planet, with funeral parties banned in the De… [+5905 chars]
